comment.author: 72774659@N07
comment._content:
It might be a hoax, it might be real... no one can know for sure.
I seldom think of ghost, but sometimes I think of how my dogs acted a bit strangely like they saw ghosts, or something us human would never know what. But I still can't accept any ghost-stories maybe until I have a good reason for the existence of ghost here in our reality.
Does another sort of reality (like ghost's one) have a reason to exist and exist parallel with ours? Is there a possibility that it's not them but us being-ghost to a third party? hehe, it's very interesting at that angle to see things. Anything can be possible, ain't it?
;>).
